TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleBinary extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable
Public Structure OracleBinary Implements IComparable, INullable
public value class OracleBinary : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable

summary.span: Representa un flujo de datos binarios de longitud variable que se va a almacenar en una base de datos o se va a recuperar de una base de datos.

span.span: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener un objeto, llame a la método.To obtain an object, call the method.
